verses.verse: I love <WH157> the Lord <WH3068>, because he has heard <WH8085> my voice <WH6963> and my supplications <WH8469>.
Because he has inclined <WH5186> his ear <WH241> unto me <WH7121>, therefore will I call upon him as long as I live <WH3117>.
The sorrows <WH2256> of death <WH4194> surrounded <WH661> me <WH4712>, and the pains of hell <WH7585> got a hold <WH4672> on me <WH4672>: I found trouble <WH6869> and sorrow <WH3015>.
Then called <WH7121> I upon the name <WH8034> of the Lord <WH3068>; O Lord <WH3068>, I beg <WH577> you <WH4422>, deliver my soul <WH5315>.
Gracious <WH2587> is the Lord <WH3068>, and righteous <WH6662>; Yes <WH430>, our God is merciful <WH7355>.
The Lord <WH3068> preserves <WH8104> the simple <WH6612>: I was brought low <WH1809>, and he helped me <WH3467>.
Return <WH7725> unto your rest <WH4494>, O my soul <WH5315>; for the Lord <WH3068> has dealt bountifully with you <WH1580>.
For you have delivered <WH2502> my soul <WH5315> from death <WH4194>, my eyes <WH5869> from tears <WH1832>, and my feet <WH7272> from falling <WH1762>.
I will walk <WH1980> before <WH6440> the Lord <WH3068> in the land <WH776> of the living <WH2416>.
I believed <WH539>, therefore have I spoken <WH1696>: I was greatly <WH3966> afflicted <WH6031>:
I said <WH559> in my haste <WH2648>, All men <WH120> are liars <WH3576>.
What shall I render <WH7725> unto the Lord <WH3068> for all his benefits toward me <WH8408>?
I will take <WH5375> the cup <WH3563> of salvation <WH3444>, and call <WH7121> upon the name <WH8034> of the Lord <WH3068>.
I will pay <WH7999> my vows <WH5088> unto the Lord <WH3068> now in the presence of all his people <WH5971>.
Precious <WH3368> in the sight <WH5869> of the Lord <WH3068> is the death <WH4194> of his saints <WH2623>.
O Lord <WH3068>, truly <WH577> I am your servant <WH5650>; I am your servant <WH5650>, and the son <WH1121> of your handmaid <WH519>: you have loosened <WH6605> my bonds <WH4147>.
I will offer <WH2076> to you the sacrifice <WH2077> of thanksgiving <WH8426>, and will call <WH7121> upon the name <WH8034> of the Lord <WH3068>.
I will pay <WH7999> my vows <WH5088> unto the Lord <WH3068> now in the presence of all his people <WH5971>,
In the courts <WH2691> of the Lord <WH3068>'s house <WH1004>, in the middle <WH8432> of you <WH3389>, O Jerusalem. Praise <WH1984> you the Lord <WH3050>.
